abstract: Police officials in Bangladesh report detonation of three bombs in two mosques at naval base in port city, during prayer services, wounding six naval personnel; two suspects are arrested.
lead_paragraph: Three powerful bombs exploded Friday in two mosques at a naval base in Chittagong during prayer services, the police said.

headline.main: Bombs at Bangladeshi Mosques Wound Naval Personnel, Police Say
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Bangladesh: Bombs at Naval Base

snippet: Three powerful bombs exploded Friday in two mosques at a naval base in Chittagong during prayer services, the police said.
